violation.message: CompoundWordsShouldBeCasedCorrectly - In member 'ImageMetaData.IsMetaDataEqual(ImageMetaData)', the compound word 'MetaData' in parameter name 'imageMetaData' exists as a discrete term. If your usage is intended to be single word, case it as 'Metadata' or strip the first token entirely if it represents any sort of Hungarian notation.
violation.popup-message: Avoid creating compound words from terms which exist in the dictionary as discrete terms. Do not create a compound word such as 'StopWatch' or 'PopUp'. These terms are recognized in the dictionary and should be cased as 'Stopwatch' and 'Popup'.

file.line: /// This method returns if the meta data objects are equal.
/// <param name="imageMetaData">This the external meta data that is being compared.</param>
/// <returns>This returns true if the meta data is equal and false otherwise.</returns>
